branch_radius.description: Radius to include branches within (in meters)

customer_feedback.description: URL to redirect to when visit is ended.

service_fetch_interval.description: The interval (in seconds) at which service information is refreshed periodically, this setting is only used if the setting Show number of waiting customers are enabled

service_screen_timeout.description: The time duration (in minutes) which the app will stay in services screen without creating a ticket

branch_open_hours.description: Open hours of all branches in general

create_new_ticket.description: Enable or disable access to create visits using the Mobile Ticket UI, 'on=enable', 'off=disable'

show_number_of_waiting_customers.description: If this setting is enabled the number of waiting customers will appear in the service list, if disabled only service names are listed.

appointment_late.description: How long is the customer allowed to arrive for his appointment (in minutes)

appointment_early.description: How early is the customer allowed to arrive for his appointment (in minutes)

timeFormat.description: Time format for showing the appointment time. Allowed settings are HH:mm, hh:mm, hh:mm a, h:mm, h:mm a

dateFormat.description: Date format for showing the appointment date. Allowed placeholders are DD MM YY YYYY

customer_data.description: Enable or disable customer access to enter customer phone number using mobile ticket UI, 'on = enable', 'off = disable'

privacy_policy.description: Enable or disable privacy policy when sending phone number, 'on = enable', 'off = disable'

active_consent.description: Enable or disable whether customer need to actively press button to agree privacy policy

privacy_policy_link.description: URL of privacy policy information starting with http:// or https://. If value is null privacy policy information will get from the property file.

country_code.description: Define the country code for phone number. If value is null no country code will be added.

queue_poll_retry.description: Define how many times should retry the queue poll request.
